channel.title: CVE Feed for Vsourz Digital -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-30506|2024-03-29T14:13:11.584Z -- vsourz%20digital -- all%20in%20one%20redirection
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Vsourz Digital All In One Redirection allows Stored XSS.This issue affects All In One Redirection: from n/a through 2.2.0.
